Description: Confirm certification basis scope boundaries for ATA 00 (in/out) and publish in scope-interfaces artifact
Define authority engagement cadence and decision rights (RACI) for K01/ATA00 and link to decision record

Define RBAC role matrix for K01 artifacts (CODEOWNERS + required reviews) and validate enforcement in a PR
Define evidence pack manifest structure and acceptance criteria (what “complete” means) and link to K01 ASSETS/SCHEMAS
Establish audit query path (click-path or script) proving decision→criteria→evidence→release pack
Confirm cross-ATA dependency list for K01 (minimum: 91,93,98,100,109) and add interface rows in scope-interfaces
Publish closure summary template as ACTIVE upon first evidence completion and initiate closure checklist
Run nomenclature + link integrity checks after retrofit and record results in closure summary
